titles.title: School Energy Crisis Relief Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Energy to establish a program of energy assistance grants to local educational agencies.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 11/10/2005--Introduced. School Energy Crisis Relief Act - Directs the Secretary of Energy to establish a grants program for eligible local educational agencies that have experienced the highest percentage increase (or expenditure increase) in transportation and heating fuel costs among all local educational agencies in a state for a specific time period during the 2005-2006 school year, in comparison to the same time period during the 2004-2005 school year.
